name: 3 Onion Biscuits
description: Tasty, easy-to-make biscuits that deliver on flavour thanks to 3 Onion Dip Mix. This recipe makes a big batch. Serve these at dinner and send the kids to school with them as part of their lunch, they’ll love it!
preparation: In a large bowl, whisk together first four ingredients. Using your fingertips, rub butter into dry ingredients until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
In a separate bowl, whisk milk and 3 Onion Dip Mix together. Add milk mixture to dry ingredients, stirring until clumps form.
Transfer dough to a floured surface and knead until dough holds together.
Roll dough out to an 8" square of 1⁄2" thickness. Cut 4 across and 4 down to create 16 biscuits. Transfer biscuits to Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner, and brush with butter.
Bake 15–18 minutes, or until biscuits are golden brown. Serve warm.
tips: 3 Onion Biscuits can be baked early in the day and loosely covered until ready to serve.
